description.p: You have spent your time in the Hunter's Guild training under the tutelage of the handlers that came before you. Even as an initiate you are the caretaker of your party. You use your knowledge of monsters to prepare your group and ensure that they are taken care of, whether they are in the town or in the field. You also act as the liason between the guild and the hunters, providing detailed reports on the hunts and other events when you return to town.

ul.li: Tool Proficiencies: Cartographer's Tools, Cook's Utensils
Equipment: One set of traveler's clothes, a guild card, empty book, quill and ink, 3 regional maps, and a pouch containing 15 gp

b.big: As a member of the Hunter's Guild you are granted additional features:

setters.set: History, Nature, Cartographer's Tools, Cook's Utensils

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I am passionate and easily excitable.
I am observant and ask a lot of questions.
I am quiet and analytical.
I am comfortable talking about nature, but very awkward interacting socially.
I am tireless when researching or learning, which I always seem to be doing.
I expect others to listen to me and get very frustrate with those who don't value my opinion.
I enjoy being busy and am uneasy when idle.
I am hardworking and reliable.

select.name: Ideals
select.item: Guild. My guild is all that really matters. (Any)
Vanity. I deserve to be treated as an important person because of what I know. (Evil)
Balance. The world functions when things are in balance. (Lawful)
Exploration. Experiencing history is the only thing better than learning of it. (Chaotic)
Objectivity. Opinion must not intrude on analysis; we must stay objective.
Driven. I want to know everything I can. (Any)

select.name: Bonds
select.item: Everything goes in my journal, which is my legacy.
I have heard of a scroll that contains knowledge I seek; I must find it.
I study the world to understand why my home village was destroyed.
My hunter allies are as friend and family to me as my own flesh and blood, and I will never abadon them.
I owe everything to my mentor, but they vanished. I must find them.
My clumsy initial studies have brought me to the attention of a powerful being; it watches me.

select.name: Flaws
select.item: I tend to shorten pet names I use for my colleagues. Aka someone I'd call partner, is shortened to "Pard".
I cannot pass up the chance to learn about the ancient civilization.
I'm constantly getting myself into trouble all for the sake of some food.
I talk FAR too much.
I am overly serious, to the point of disbelief sometimes.
I have a tendency to overestimate the capability of my team.
